author: philip
msg: Fix issue 1825.  Items in state deleted="true" or absent="true"
always need less handling than on-disk items.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_crawler.c (report_revisions): Tweak
handling of deleted/absent items in an incomplete directory.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/switch_tests.py
(test_list): Remove XFail from obstructed_switch.

author: mbk
msg: Fix broken URLs in APR autoconf macro.

author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  create 'svnlook lock' subcommand, to examine lock fields.
* svnlook/main.c
(cmd_table):        add 'lock' subcommand.
(subcommand_lock):  new function.
* libsvn_repos/repos.c
(create_hooks):   update name of subcommand is hook template sample.

author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  create an authz_read wrapper around one of fs locking funcs.
* include/svn_repos.h
(svn_repos_fs_get_locks):   oops, this takes a repos_t, not an fs_t.
* libsvn_repos/fs-wrap.c
(svn_repos_fs_get_locks):   new wrapper func, uses authz_read callback.

author: lundblad
msg: Fix a bug introduced in r11775.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/diff.c (close_file): Don't set temp_file_path to a
temp file unless there are file modifications.
